Rooms.title: Rooms & Suites
Rooms.subtitle: Each room designed with Feng Shui principles for harmony and rest

standard.name: Standard Stone Room
standard.description: Experience the authentic charm of Alaçatı in our Standard Stone Rooms. Featuring original stone walls that keep the room naturally cool in summer and warm in winter, these rooms are designed with Feng Shui principles to ensure a restful energy flow. Enjoy views of our tranquil courtyard or garden.

deluxe.name: Deluxe Suite
deluxe.description: Our Deluxe Suites offer an elevated level of luxury with extra space and premium amenities. Each suite features a separate seating area perfect for relaxation, a private French balcony overlooking the village, and a Nespresso machine for your morning coffee ritual.

family.name: Family Stone Suite
family.description: Ideal for families or groups of friends, our Family Stone Suite consists of two connecting rooms that offer both privacy and togetherness. With two bathrooms and ample space, it provides a comfortable home-away-from-home experience in the heart of Alaçatı.
